aws_ecr_lifecycle_policy.description: Manages an ECR repository lifecycle policy.

repository.description: Name of the repository to apply the policy.

policy.description: The policy document. This is a JSON formatted string. See more details about [Policy Parameters](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonECR/latest/userguide/LifecyclePolicies.html#lifecycle_policy_parameters

registry_id.description: The registry ID where the repository was created.
